content: **materials ** * 1 ball green mc * 1 ball yellow a * 1 ball white b * 1 ball small amount of black c for embroidery * size 4 mm u s g or 6 crochet hook * small amount of stuffing for frog s eyes also on favecrafts 1 as bath friends puppets companion whale pattern bath buddies /patterns/library/bath-buddies 1 http //www favecrafts com/crochet-for-kids/bath-friends-puppets-crochet-pattern
